project.name: Hygienic tank lining series
project.description: Development of solventborne and waterborne tank linings for Mediterranean Bottling syrup and water tanks.

input.message: I cannot pause this project. Only the project Lead (Bhwa_041) or Corporate Leadership can change the project status. As an Engineer on this project, I don't have permission to modify its status. Please contact the project Lead to request this change.
